meanings.definition: The act of officiating a sports game as a referee.
meanings.sent1: During the soccer match, the reffing was done by a strict referee.
meanings.sent2: The reffing at the basketball game was fair and unbiased.
meanings.sent3: The reffing at the tennis tournament was so good, even the players applauded.
meanings.sent4: Her reffing was like a guiding light, ensuring the game ran smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The reffing was so precise, it felt like a well-choreographed dance.

meanings.definition: The practice of making decisions or judgments in a fair and impartial manner.
meanings.sent1: His reffing in the debate club always impressed the members.
meanings.sent2: The reffing in the courtroom was crucial for delivering justice.
meanings.sent3: Even in a game of pretend, her reffing of the rules was taken seriously.
meanings.sent4: The reffing of the teacher in class discussions was always respected.
meanings.sent5: The reffing of the jury determined the fate of the accused.
